short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the definitions of all big or complex words from every webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Word definer is the perfect extension for all of your vocabulary needs. Every webpage visited will have a compiled list of words in the toolbar that have been pulled directly from the page. Figure out words you do not know by retrieving their definitions instantly at the click of a button.
